name: Hi-chat
tagline: Native programming chat realtime with PHP
body: # hi-chat Native programming realtime chat with PHP This chat can send tag HTML like <b> <u> <i> <marquee> <h1> <h2> <h3> <h4> Sign Up, Search friends, Add friends, Create Group chat username: demodemo ; password: demodemo Let's start developing with me Hi Chat
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
